QAPair.Question: What is (are) Cerebral palsy - resources ?
QAPair.Answer: The following organizations are good resources for information on cerebral palsy : Centers for Disease Control and Prevention -- www.cdc.gov/ncbddd/cp/index.html , Cerebral Palsy Foundation -- www.yourcpf.org , National Institute of Neurological Disorders and Stroke -- www.ninds.nih.gov/health-information/disorders/cerebral-palsy , United Cerebral Palsy -- ucp.org , US National Library of Medicine, MedlinePlus -- medlineplus.gov/cerebralpalsy.html ,
